title: 3D muscle reconstruction shows 3.2 million-year-old “Lucy” walked upright
description: "Lucy’s muscles suggest that she was as proficient at bipedalism as we are."

title: OpenAI rolls out big chatbot API upgrades for developers
description: API updates include 4x larger conversation memory for GPT-3.5 and function calling.

title: Lead admin of child sex abuse website pleads guilty, faces 20 years to life
description: DOJ: Website had "section devoted to the sexual abuse of infants and toddlers."

title: Reddit CEO assures employees that API pricing protests haven’t hurt revenue
description: Furor "will pass," Huffman says in internal memo reportedly viewed by The Verge.

title: Alan Wake II preview: A waking nightmare
description: Are you afraid of the dark?

title: For reasons no one can fathom, McDonald’s has released a new Game Boy Color game
description: Krool Games regularly develops new games for Nintendo's 25-year-old handheld.

title: Montana calls UN climate report “hearsay” at landmark youth-led climate trial
description: Official: “Montana’s emissions are simply too minuscule to make any difference."

title: Megaplume of water vapor erupting on Enceladus caught by Webb Telescope
description: Enceladus' rapid orbit and large geysers spread water widely near Saturn.

title: A company called Atari is releasing a brand-new 2600 cartridge this year
description: Today's Atari could hardly have less to do with the one that released the VCS.

title: Microsoft promises Starfield has “fewest bugs” of any Bethesda game
description: Xbox exec: "Every QA person in our... company [is] playing Starfield right now."

title: Monkey Island creator Ron Gilbert “wasn’t even told” about Sea of Thieves DLC
description: Disney owns the LucasArts catalog, and Disney only calls you if it needs to.

title: Paul McCartney: AI has enabled a “final” Beatles song
description: AI voice-separation tech pioneered for "Get Back" will bring Lennon demo to life.

title: With Ford and GM’s help, Tesla reignites the charging standard war
description: One plug or two? The EV charging industry reacts to Ford/GM/Tesla deal.

title: Brother Day wages war to cling to power in Foundation S2 trailer
description: Brother Day: "I will look at them in the eye and reclaim what is ours."

title: An anti-porn app put him in jail and his family under surveillance
description: A court used an app called Covenant Eyes to surveil the family of a man released on bond.

title: Hackers can steal cryptographic keys by video-recording power LEDs 60 feet away
description: Key-leaking side channels are a fact of life. Now they can be done by video-recording power LEDs.
